snippet: Members of the ethnic Berber minority on Tuesday forced their way into the Parliament building in Tripoli, demanding that Berber be made an official language.
abstract: Members of Libya’s ethnic Berber minority force their way into and vandalize Parliament building in Tripoli in demonstration to demand greater recognition, calling for Berber language to be made official language on par with Arabic.
lead_paragraph: Members of the ethnic Berber minority on Tuesday forced their way into the Parliament building in Tripoli, demanding that Berber be made an official language.
